title: Adobe SpeedGrade CC 2015 (v9.0) RUS-ENG by M0nkrus-=TEAM OS=-
description:
Software Version: 2015.0.0 (9.0.0.0)
assembly Author : m0nkrus
Language: English / Russian
Treatment: complete
Type of medicine: keygen + patch

System requirements:
- Processor Intel Core2 Duo or AMD Phenom II with 64-bit applications
- Microsoft Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit), Windows 8 or Windows 8 (64-bit)
- 4 GB of RAM (8 GB recommended)
- 4 GB of free hard disk space for installation. During the installation requires additional free space (can not install on removable flash memory device)
- Requires additional disk space for files, providing a preview, and other working files (10GB recommended)
- Requires screen 1280 x 800. It is recommended to use the screen in 1920 x 1080 and a second screen with a professional calibration for viewing
- Hard disk with a speed of at least 7200 rev / min (it is recommended to use some fast hard drives, preferably RAID 0)
- Sound card compatible with ASIO protocol or Microsoft Windows Driver Model
- To use QuickTime features require installation of QuickTime 7.6.6
- Dedicated graphics card with video memory of at least 1 GB
- Optional: Adobe-certified GPU hardware acceleration
- Optional: Tangent CP200, Tangent Elements family or Tangent Wave control surface
- Optional: O SDI, card NVIDIA Quadro SDI Output
- To access the Web service requires an Internet connection and registration

Description: Adobe SpeedGrade CC 2015 - is an application for gradations of color, with which you can perform color correction on the basis of layers.
It also has a design tool for visual consistency and attractiveness of projects for the creation of digital video. A wide range of tools for improving the styling and video software Adobe SpeedGrade CC 2015 is designed for editors,
cinematographers, colorists and experts on visual effects that seek to bring their work to perfection. Adobe SpeedGrade CC 2015 includes professionally designed presets,
filters that can be applied in combination (including the face mask), as well as emulation of film to help you get started as quickly as possible. Full integration Lumetri Deep Color Engine in Adobe Premiere Pro,
as well as built-in support Look-files in Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects and Photoshop to help provide a visual line throughout the production line.

- The distribution is integrated utility Adobe Update Managment Tool 8.0 (developed PAINTER ), which allows you to set the "cloud" update.
